project.name: Codice :: Thirdparty :: Apache Tika OSGi Bundle
project.description:
OSGi bundle that contains tika-parsers. Repackaged to include the full ooxml-schemas instead of the poi-ooxml-schemas subset. This is done to provide more parsing capabilities when using Tika.
https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/TIKA-2094
